sense.def: Pathological Condition of ge qi 膈氣 , occlusion qi, resulting from congestion brought forth by a mutual interference of phlegm and qi. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 51: 治肺脾風壅，痰膈，不 下食飲，頭目昏悶，四肢煩疼，旋覆花散方 , “To cure lung and spleen wind congestion, phlegm occlusion , when food and beverages fail to descend, with clouding affecting the head and eyes, as well as heart-pressure and vexation pain affecting the four limbs, [ingest] the recipe for the powder with xuan fu hua ”.
